name: ZODIAC Versus
description:
ATTENTION: The browser version of the game above doesn't support controller vibration and videos! For the better version get the ones available for download!

This is my Project that is the culmination for two Coursera's Game Development Specializations.

It is based off the Street of Rage classic games using as a base the amazing scripts from YangBin, which I modified and tweaked for some weeks.

Feature Set of the Game:

  • 2 Playable Characters with slightly different characteristics
  • 5 Playable Levels and an Ending Screen
  • Amazing Soundtrack by Of Far Different Nature
  • Controller support with Vibration!

Rare Bug: if the character is pushed too far outside the screen while he's dying, the character doesn't respawn.

It's not much but this is the first game I'm publishing publicly. I'll work to do much more with more people in the future.

I hope you will enjoy the game!

-Adriano Casa
